About Us

Halo Roofing & Renovations is a roofing company located in Benson, NC & Hampstead, NC that serves central & coastal NC. We are a family-owned and operated business that takes pride in our work. We offer a variety of services, including roof replacement (residential & commercial), siding installation, and gutter installation. WE'LL TREAT YOUR HOME LIKE IT'S OUR HOME.

What we are best at

Our Services

  • Residential Roof Replacement
    Residential Roof Replacement

    If the roof on your home is starting to show signs of wear and tear, it may be time for a residential roof replacement. Our experienced team can help you choose the best products for your roof replacement and install it quickly and efficiently.

  • Commercial Roof Replacement
    Commercial Roof Replacement

    If you are in need of a new roof, our team can help. We offer a wide range of services, from Commercial Roof Replacement to repairs and maintenance. We have the experience and expertise to get the job done right, on time and on budget.

  • Roofing Repairs
    Roofing Repairs

    If you're in need of roof repairs, our company offers a wide range of services to get your home back in shape. From shingle repair to full roof replacement, we'll work with you to find the best solution for your home.

  • Seamless Gutter & Gutter Gaurds
    Seamless Gutter & Gutter Gaurds

    Our gutter installation service is a great way to keep the most crucial areas of your home protected from water damage. We can install gutters in any style you choose, and we'll make sure we are properly fitted to your roofline.

  • Siding Installation
    Siding Installation

    We are a full-service roofing company that also offers siding installation. We have a wide selection of siding options to choose from, and we will work with you to find the perfect style and color for your home.

  • Fortified Roofer
    Fortified Roofer

    Halo Roofing & renovations Coastal Carolinas first choice for a fortified roofing system. Halo roofing we'll treat your home like it's our home.

Halo Roofing & Renovations provides a wide range of roofing services including roof inspections, repairs, replacements, and installations for both residential and commercial properties.

Halo Roofing & Renovations sets itself apart by offering personalized, hands-on customer service, top-notch craftsmanship, and a commitment to using high-quality materials for every project. We strive to exceed our customers' expectations and guarantee satisfaction with every job we complete. Finally, We'll treat your home like its our home.

Yes, you can easily schedule a free estimate with us online by filling out our contact form on our website.
